entry.title: Incident with Actions, Git Operations and Pages
entry.content:
Jan 19, 20:51 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 19, 20:11 UTC
Update - We have applied a mitigation that has reduced impact to Actions, but error rates are still elevated. We continue to work with our dependency team on additional mitigations.

Jan 19, 19:31 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions, resulting in slow or failed jobs. Root cause in a dependency is understood and we are working with that team on a mitigation.

Jan 19, 18:49 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions, resulting in slow or failed jobs. Root cause in a dependency is understood and we are working with that team on a mitigation.

Jan 19, 18:07 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions, resulting in slow or failed jobs. Root cause in a dependency is understood and we are working with that team on a mitigation.

Jan 19, 17:27 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions artifact uploads and downloads, causing slow or failed jobs. We are investigating the root cause and will provide updates as we learn more.

Jan 19, 16:54 UTC
Update - We are observing an issue that impacts Actions artifact uploads and downloads, causing slow or failed jobs. We are investigating the root cause and will provide updates as we learn more.

Jan 19, 16:52 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Jan 19, 16:49 UTC
Update - Git Operations is operating normally.

Jan 19, 16:09 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Jan 19, 15:57 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations.

entry.title: Incident with Copilot
entry.content:
Jan 18, 20:16 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 18, 19:50 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): Copilot. We see authentication failures for a small percentage of users. We are investigating the root cause and will update as we learn more.

Jan 18, 19:00 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): Copilot. We see authentication failures for a small percentage of users. We are investigating the root cause and will update as we learn more.

Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Copilot.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Jan 16, 16:43 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 16, 16:31 UTC
Update - We found an issue that caused high database replication lag, leading to issues visible in multiple services. We have resolved this issue and are expecting services to become healthy once queues drain.

Jan 16, 15:51 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Jan 14, 16:58 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 14, 16:09 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Codespaces port forwarding. Users may be able to use the desktop client as a workaround.

Jan 14, 15:13 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Copilot
entry.content:
Jan 12, 04:55 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 12, 04:51 UTC
Update - Some Copilot plans were impacted by a recent backend change causing those users to see an error that access has ended. We have applied a change to correct this and are seeing full recovery.

Jan 12, 03:59 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Copilot.

entry.content:

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations.

entry.content:

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Dec 20, 07:58 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 20, 07:23 UTC
Update - We are seeing delayed workflow job status updates for Actions. We are seeing the status update events being backed up and have applied a mitigation. We continue to monitor the delay.

Dec 20, 06:55 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.content:
Dec 5, 18:40 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations and Pull Requests.

entry.title: Investigating reports of degraded performance.
entry.content:
Nov 30, 17:13 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 30, 17:12 UTC
Update - The issue affecting the new code view beta has been resolved.

Nov 30, 16:21 UTC
Update - We have diagnosed that the ongoing issue related to code search and code view is limited to customers in the current beta for those features. A mitigation has been identified and is in progress.

Nov 30, 16:03 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): GitHub Search and the new Code View. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Nov 30, 16:02 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Incident with Packages and Pages
entry.content:
Nov 25, 16:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 25, 16:13 UTC
Update - GitHub Packages has almost fully recovered. Continuing to restore remaining traffic and ensure service remains healthy before returning to green.

Nov 25, 15:50 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Nov 25, 15:45 UTC
Update - Following mitigations being put in place, we are seeing recovery for GitHub Packages, GitHub Pages and ghcr.io. We are monitoring this recovery and will continue to update.

Nov 25, 15:40 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

Nov 25, 15:11 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Packages. GitHub Pages and ghcr.io are also impacted. We will continue to update users as we progress towards mitigation.

Nov 25, 15:06 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Nov 25, 14:39 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Nov 25, 14:39 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Packages.
